issue.title: Cannot access shared drive
issue.description: I cannot access the S: drive where all our case files are stored. Getting error 'Network path not found'. Colleagues in same office can access it fine.
issue.technical_details: Error code: 0x80070035. Drive mapping shows disconnected red X. Can ping file server successfully (10.1.5.20). Other network resources accessible. VPN not in use - on site.

resolution.notes: Drive mapping corrupted. Removed and remapped S: drive to \\fileserver01\social_services. Access restored.
